resources.string:
"### Welcome to FD Music! 
Welcome to the beta test of FD Music, an application to simplify the handling of your training music. 

After a few simple setup steps the app is ready to use. This wizard will guide you through the process."

### License Agreement of DiaBEATit 
 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. 

 Click [here](https://github.com/juehv/DiaBEATit/blob/master/LICENSE.txt) for the full license text.

The DiaBEATit app is intended for demonstration purposes and as research tool. This means in particular: 
* It **MUST NOT** be used to make medical decisions. 
* It will run experimental algorithms which are potentially not bug free 
* It will gather your health data and send it to us in anonymised form.

### File Access \nFD Music will save the music and some metadata on the phones storage. Therefore we need storage permission. Please press the button below and confirm the following permission dialog.

### Suggestion Service \nThe assistant service of this app will generate suggestions and reminders for treatments. Therefore the assistant will observer health data and your daily routine including locations. Therefore we need permanent location permission. This data will not be stored or shared.
### Make some Pictures! \nYou will be able to make pictures (e.g., of your meals) for your diary. For taking this pictures DieBEATit needs camera permission.

### App Demonstration 
For demonstration purposes you can start the app in Demo-Mode. The app will behave identically but will use fake data. We desined the fake data input in a way to demonstrate all functions of the app within a week. We took care that you will not get disturbed at night. 

**Note:** To deactivate the demonstration mode, please reinstall the app to ensure a consistent database.

### Setup completed! 
All done! **Please reopen the App after pressing the finish button.** 

We wish you much fun using our app!
### Passphrase! \nAs the music is not to be distributed beyond our group, hence we must protect access. Please enter the password you got from the team.
The Demo Mode already wrote data to the database. To disable Demo Mode please reinstall the app. This ensures database consistency.
You have to grand requested permissions to finish the setup.
You have to fill the correct password provided by your trainer.
You have to read and accept the data contribution agreements
